hero.subtitle: I like anything related to IT.
hero.student: computer engineering student at Diponegoro University

about.title: about-me
about.funfactdesc1: I can listen to the same song on repeat all day without getting bored.
about.funfactdesc2: I take longer choosing what to eat than actually eating it.
about.funfactdesc3: I always say 'one more episode'… then finish the whole season.
about.funfactdesc4: I love making checklists, even for the simplest tasks.
about.funfactdesc5: I keep way too many browser tabs open because 'I’ll read them later'.
about.funfactdesc6: I reply to messages in my head and forget to actually send them.
about.name: Hello, I'm Qalby!
about.desc: I’m a network engineer and web developer passionate about building efficient web applications and optimizing network systems. I enjoy learning new technologies and creating projects that solve real problems.
about.desc2: I’m always exploring new ideas and technologies, experimenting with projects, and looking for opportunities to apply my skills.
about.desc3: I'm a network engineer based in Pekalongan. I specialize in routing, switching, IP management, VLAN configuration, as well as DNS, VPN, and network monitoring to build structured, stable, and scalable networks.

project.title: projects
project.title2: A collection of projects I've worked on, ranging from network administration tools to web applications. Each project represents a unique challenge and learning experience in my development journey.
project.project: Network administration toolkit featuring IPv4 calculator, bandwidth calculator, DNS checker, and various networking utilities for network engineers.
project.project1: Collection of RouterOS scripts for automation, monitoring, and network management. Includes firewall rules, bandwidth management, and system optimization scripts.
project.project2: This very website you're browsing! A modern, responsive portfolio showcasing my projects and skills. Built with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS.
project.project3: Stay tuned for more exciting projects! Currently working on several ideas in network automation and web development.
project.call1: I'm always open to discussing new projects, opportunities, or just having a chat about technology and development.

quote.text: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quote.author: Steve Jobs
